text:
[Verse]
In the rain we play our game
Laughing loud wild and free
Splashing puddles in our name
Feel the joy just you and me

[Verse]
Clouds above don't mean a thing
Sky's a canvas we redefine
Every drop makes our hearts sing
Dancing feet right on the line

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain again
Jumping high don't feel the pain
Let the rhythm be our friend
Until the sunshine breaks the chain

[Verse]
Fire in our hearts glows bright
Wet and wild with pure delight
Every moment feels so right
We'll keep going through the night

[Bridge]
Hands held tight and spirits fly
Underneath the stormy sky
Lost in music you and I
Never letting go till dry

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain again
Jumping high don't feel the pain
Let the rhythm be our friend
Until the sunshine breaks the chain
title: Dancing in the Rain
